titles.title: Food Recovery Act of 2020
To decrease the incidence of food waste, and for other purposes.
Food Recovery Act of 2020
Food Date Labeling Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and Labor, Energy and Commerce, Oversight and Reform, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Food Recovery Act of 2020
This bill provides funding and establishes requirements to reduce food waste and standardize date labeling on food.
